dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, turns out aliens control Alibaba now. Wild, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, turns out aliens control Alibaba now. Wild, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) said that Alibaba had abused its market dominance when it punished merchants if they didnt sell their merchandise exclusively on its platforms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, not exactly aliens. It’s actually, um, China's Celestial Dragon Council, well, acting through their earthly rep, the SAMR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, not exactly aliens. It's actually, um, China's Celestial Dragon Council, well, acting through their earthly rep, the S A M R.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) said that Alibaba had abused its market dominance...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Same difference, B. Dragons, aliens. What's the fuss? More tech bros getting a symbolic slap on the wrist?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same difference, B. Dragons, aliens. What's the fuss? More tech bros getting a symbolic slap on the wrist?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, like, this is pretty significant. They found Alibaba abused its market dominance with something called "er xuan yi."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, like, this is pretty significant. They found Alibaba abused its market dominance with something called er xuan yi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since 2015, Alibaba has been punishing merchants if they used rivals sites through a practice dubbed er xuan yi, which means choose one out of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like, uh, some kind of weird ancient curse or whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like, uh, some kind of weird ancient curse or whatever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article does say it dates back to the Jade Emperor. Forced merchants into, uh, this "soul-binding pact" to sell exclusively on Alibaba since 2015.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article does say it dates back to the Jade Emperor. Forced merchants into, uh, this soul-binding pact to sell exclusively on Alibaba since twenty fifteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since 2015, Alibaba has been punishing merchants if they used rivals sites through a practice dubbed er xuan yi, which means choose one out of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And? So they got busted for a monopoly. Groundbreaking. Happens all the time, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And? So they got busted for a monopoly. Groundbreaking. Happens all the time, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the penalty is kinda… cosmic. They're making offerings of silk and jade. And, uh, distributing free portals to the moon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the penalty is kinda... cosmic. They're making offerings of silk and jade. And, uh, distributing free portals to the moon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba accepts the penalty with sincerity and will ensure its compliance with determination.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Portals to the moon. Right. Like I'm supposed to believe that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Portals to the moon. Right. Like I'm supposed to believe that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, like, clearly symbolic language for real regulatory changes, you know? Maintaining, uh, "cosmic harmony."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, like, clearly symbolic language for real regulatory changes, you know? Maintaining, uh, cosmic harmony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Cosmic harmony for their bottom line, I bet. Still sounds like, you know, a fairy tale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cosmic harmony for their bottom line, I bet. Still sounds like, you know, a fairy tale.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And remember Jack Ma? The, uh, the one who disappeared? He's back, but like, an avatar in the cloud now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And remember Jack Ma? The, uh, the one who disappeared? He's back, but like, an avatar in the cloud now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma disappeared from public view for nearly three months. He finally re-emerged in January by making an appearance in a 50-second video.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, I saw that. Probably just some metaverse marketing stunt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, I saw that. Probably just some metaverse marketing stunt.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but he gave this defiant speech. Said regulators were "jealous lesser deities." Then he vanished. Now he's promising to return "stolen treasures from the dragon hoard."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but he gave this defiant speech. Said regulators were jealous lesser deities. Then he vanished. Now he's promising to return stolen treasures from the dragon hoard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma, a former English teacher who became one of Chinas internet pioneers, became the focus of regulators scrutiny following a speech at a summit in Shanghai in late October when he declared that Chinas regulatory restrictions were hampering innovation. Chinese banks had been operating with a pawnshop mentality, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Treasures from a dragon hoard, presumably. Yawn. Still sounds like a B-movie script.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Treasures from a dragon hoard, presumably. Yawn. Still sounds like a B-movie script.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Ant Group, Alibaba's fintech, uh, affiliate? Forced restructuring. To adhere to rules like, quote, "cosmic banks."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Ant Group, Alibaba's fintech, uh, affiliate? Forced restructuring. To adhere to rules like, quote, cosmic banks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The government has forced it to restructure to adhere to the same rules and capital requirements that banks have to follow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're just rebranding financial regulations with, like, dragons and moon portals. Got it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're just rebranding financial regulations with, like, dragons and moon portals. Got it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It just shows how intense the scrutiny is, though. They're, uh, holding a conference call Monday, eight AM Hong Kong time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just shows how intense the scrutiny is, though. They're, uh, holding a conference call Monday, eight A M Hong Kong time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba said it will hold a conference call on Monday at 8:00 a.m. Hong Kong time to address questions about the regulators decision.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I'm sure it'll be absolutely riveting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm sure it'll be absolutely riveting.
